import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios'; export const AddCourse = () => { const [response, setResponse] = useState('') const [courseName, setCourseName] = useState('') const [courseId, setCourseId] = useState('') const [regulation, setRegulation] = useState('') const handleAddCourse = async () =>{ var co = (document.getElementById('co_input').value).split('\n') for (let i = 0; i < co.length; i++) { if (co[i].includes('\n')) co[i]=co[i].split('\n')[0] } co.splice(0, 1) const data = { courseName: courseName, courseId: courseId, regulation: regulation, co:co } const { data: res } = await axios.post('addFeedBack') setResponse(res.message) } return (

{ response }
) }
